name: Levis
body:
### Welcome to My Page.
Here you'll find discussions on projects I'm currently working/checking on.
Github has a lot of really cool projects that I'm just beginning to discover.
I like using NLP tools, and I find machine learning very interesting.

### About me
Not really much to say here.

### What are you working on?
A quoting system at the moment. It's a pretty big project. Building locally, using flask framework, sqlite3 for data storage, html, css3, javascript/jquery. 
Also working on another flask app, mulyrica. I will be using nlp libraries (app is developed using python). Writing my own API.

### How can I contact you, 
write to me 0xc06cd103938bf72a
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
